about_the_game:
Dragon Gate: Tournament is a futuristic arcade combat racer for up to four players in which only the fastest and most skillful survive. In fast-paced, short races, you fight for every metre while an orbital laser pulverises anyone who falls too far behind. Knocked out? No problem! With homing missiles, you can still intervene in the action and decide who comes out on top. Are you ready to become the champion?

In Dragon Gate: Tournament, up to four players race against each other in multiple high-speed sprints, competing to earn points. A sprint ends when only one player remains, as any player who falls too far behind the leader is eliminated by a powerful enormous orbital beam.

Upgrade your car with Power-UPs such as a Gatling Gun, Explosive Barrels or a Portal Cannon to give you the advantage you need to outrun your rivals.

Even after elimination, players can still influence the outcome by launching homing missiles at the remaining racers, impacting the race and shaping victory or defeat!

The race tracks are packed with secrets, hidden shortcuts and mechanics to discover. Will they help you to victory or bring about your downfall?

Points are awarded or deducted based on each player’s finishing position. The first player to accumulate 10 points across several sprints wins the game. Alliances between players can ensure that the leaders are taken out of the race. But how long will they last?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: Apple M1 or 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 or Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra - 10.13.1
  • Processor: Apple M1 or 3.1 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 or AMD Radeon Pro 560 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 780m
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Dragon Gate: Tournament

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / Radeon 6870 / Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 3.3GHz / AMD FX 8350 4.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 4GB VRAM / AMD R9 280 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Compete in short, deadly sprints full of power-ups, dangers and fierce rivalries where only speed and skill mean survival. Are you ready to take the crown?
